summary: James Cameron and Bill Paxton, director and actor of the 1997 film Titanic, travel to the final undersea resting place of the ill-fated ship of dreams.
cast: Bill Paxton|John Broadwater|Lori Johnston|Charles Pellegrino|Don Lynch|Ken Marschall|James Cameron|Mike Cameron|Jeffrey N. Ledda|Corey Jaskolski|Jason Paul|Eric Schmitz|Genya Chernaiev|Victor Nischeta|Anatoly M. Sagalevitch|Lewis Abernathy|John Bruno|Vince Pace|Miguel Wilkins|Federico Zambrano|Dale Ridge|Judy Prestininzi|Adriana Valdez|Justin Shaw|Thomas Kilroy|Charlie Arneson|Piper Gunnarson|John Donovan|Janace Tashjian|Jesse Baker|Justin Baker|Stacey Hayes|Barron Christian|Aaron C. Fitzgerald|Ellen O'Brien|Tava Smiley
title: Misterios del Titanic
